marklogic.body:
It's really hard to say now. Not saying before this they were really planing on getting kuechly, but that's what it looked like. They still very may well plan On drafting him and seriously change up the lb corps. I feel as though dt or they move back in the first or out of first completely. There are now no glaring holes on this team. Are there any corners that would be fit for the 15th Spot?
Hell, with 2 second round picks is it possible roseman moves down in draft and selects Vicks replacement? I highly doubt that would be it, but always a possibility. I Just have a strong feeling we aren't staying at 15.
